text: South Jeolla Province (Jeollanam-do) is divided into 5 cities (si) and 17 counties (gun). They're also divided into 31 towns (eup), 198 townships (myeon), and 67 neighborhoods (dong).http://www.jeonnam.go.kr/mbs/jeonnam/subview.jsp?id=jeonnam_070103000000 ==Table== {|class="wikitable sortable" !
